nodes.bodyText: Nit: Can we update (1) the config name and (2) the corresponding static variables for config and its doc to represent the unit of the timeout? -- i.e. can we add .ms and _MS prefixes, respectively?
Can we add a sanity check to ensure that maxAttempts > 0 to avoid a deadlock due to bad user input?
Can we save some CPU cycles by avoiding the use of pow() and instead update the timeToSleep at each round using a single multiplication?
Can we avoid hardcoding inputs to NewTopic and instead use static final variables?
